name: My Party Needs An Alchemist
storyline:
In this light-hearted fantasy adventure game, you play as an alchemist!
Embark on a quest to save the world with a party of brave adventurers in this light-hearted fantasy adventure game.
summary: Gather herbs and brew powerful potions as you travel a magical world and forge a party of intriguing companions to defeat the demon lord in this cozy fantasy adventure game!
